name: Quadrilateral
description: Resize and move windows using your keyboard

thirds-01.description: Thirds 01: Move window to the left third of the screen.

thirds-02.description: Thirds 02: Move window to the middle third of the screen.

thirds-03.description: Thirds 03: Move window to the right third of the screen.

sixths-01.description: Sixths 01: Move window to the top left sixth of the screen.

sixths-02.description: Sixths 02: Move window to the top middle sixth of the screen.

sixths-03.description: Sixths 03: Move window to the top right sixth of the screen.

sixths-04.description: Sixths 04: Move window to the bottom left sixth of the screen.

sixths-05.description: Sixths 05: Move window to the bottom middle sixth of the screen.

sixths-06.description: Sixths 06: Move window to the bottom right sixth of the screen.

quarters-01.description: Quarters 01: Move window to the top right quarter of screen.

quarters-02.description: Quarters 02: Move window to the bottom right quarter of screen.

quarters-03.description: Quarters 03: Move window to the bottom left quarter of screen.

quarters-04.description: Quarters 04: Move window to the top left quarter of screen.

halves-01.description: Halves 01: Move window to the top half of screen.

halves-02.description: Halves 02: Move window to the bottom half of screen.

halves-03.description: Halves 03: Move window to the left half of screen.

halves-04.description: Halves 04: Move window to the right half of screen.
